# Pull Request Template

## Description
Explain what changes you made and why.

## Related Issue
Link any related issue or task number.

## Type of Change
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Other (explain)

## Checklist
- [ ] I followed the project guidelines
- [ ] I added at least 10 commits on my branch
- [ ] I created the required 3 files:
  - StudentID_gb.txt
  - StudentID_devops.txt
  - StudentID_sdlc.txt
- [ ] I merged the latest main branch into my branch
- [ ] I resolved all merge conflicts
- [ ] My PR is ready for review
